Frame Type.description: Type of frame supporting the bells

Frame Restoration.description: Visible Restorations to the original frame.

Frame Cracks.description: Rating of Cracks in Frame - 0 (no cracks) 4 (countless cracks)

Frame Cleanliness.description: Rating of Cleanliness of Frame - 0 (very clean) 4 (very dirty)

Frame Warping.description: Rating of Warping of Frame - 0 (no warping) 4 (very warped)

Frame Dents.description: Rating of Dents in Frame - 0 (no dents) 4 (very dented)

Frame Overall Condition.description: Overall Rating of Condition of Frame - 0 (prestine) 4 (very poor)

Internal Decoration and Inscription Legi.description: Overall Rating of Legibility of Decorations and Inscriptions - 0 (prestine) 4 (very poor)

Frequency of Note (Hz).description: Frequency of Bell Ringing in Hz

Belt Material.description: Material of belt holding clapper to bell (usually leather).

Stock Material.description: Material of stock holding bell to frame (usually wood).

Skidmark Side (1).description: Side of the first skidmark inside bell.

Skidmark Side (2).description: Side of the second skidmark inside bell.

Safety Cable.description: Presence of safety cable holding the clapper up in case the belt breaks.

Conservation State.description: Rating for Conservation State of Clapper and Stock - 0 (well preserved) 4 (poorly preserved).

Swing Direction.description: While the bell is ringing, what direction is it swinging? (Should align with skidmark information.)

Thickness of Bell (cm).description: Thickness of bell at maximum thickness

Discoloration Rating.description: Rating for Discoloration of Bell - 0 (original color) 4 (very discolored).

Chips Rating.description: number of chips visible on bell lip (best method is to look at lip from inside bell).

Decoration Legibility.description: Rating for Legibility of Decorations on Bell - 0 (legible) 4 (not legible).

Overall Condition.description: Rating for Overall Condition of Bell - 0 (prestine condition) 4 (poor condition).

Image Description.description: Description that can be displayed on the main tower page.
Image that will be used at the top of the bell tower page.

Tour Link.description: Add url for walking tour from youtube.

Scene ID.description: label given to scene that is used to connect scenes.

Scene Title.description: Text describing what the scene is, displayed on the tour in bottom left.

Image.description: 360 view - (equirectangular image), that is the scene.

pitch.description: Initial vertical view. (90 is straight up, -90 is straight down).

yaw.description: Initial horizontal view. (90 is right, -90 is left).

label.description: The text that appears when you over over the hotspot.

Linked ID.description: For scenes, add the id of the scene the hotspot goes to. For info, add the url to go to.
